comment:
Had a sample of this at a friend’s apartment tonight. Very good highland park style sweet peat.

Nose: Chocolate, Peat, Smoke, Raspberry, Vanilla, Toffee, Cherry, Strawberry, Flowers

Palate: Cherry, Citrus, Blackberry, Oak, Chocolate, Tar, Pepper

Finish: Chocolate, Smoke, Raspberry, Cherry, Flowers, Pepper
